name: disaffected
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
no longer supporting or being satisfied with an organization or idea: The party needs to take steps to attract disaffected voters.
Young people who are disaffected are no longer satisfied with society's values: It's hard to cope with a class of disaffected teenagers. disaffected youth

Related word
disaffection
Add to word list
Add to word list
feeling unhappy about and separate from an organization or idea that you once supported: Charges of incompetence were made by disaffected members of the club.
